channel.title: IF Answers - Recent questions tagged meta

item.title: On IF Answers, should comments be hidden after edits are made to a question or answer?
item.description: Some of these questions are getting a lot of comments. In cases where people comment to make suggestions for a question or answer, and the question/answer is then edited accordingly, do you hide the comments?

item.title: What is the tag for textadventures.co.uk?
item.description: I would like to know what tag is used for games created with the online creator/editor at textadventures.co.uk. Thanks, Lewis.

item.title: On IF Answers, should the question itself mention the development system?
item.description: If it would be helpful I can edit some of the existing questions to add, for instance, "in Inform 7" to the actual question, in cases where the development system is mentioned only in the tag or in the additional info.

item.title: How do I use code formatting in posts on IF Answers?
item.description:
I have had not entirely an easy time figuring out how to format code properly in IFAnswers. I copied some code from the intfiction forum and it was automatically formatted as code, which was great, but then I couldn't figure out how to type anything that wasn't code after that and not have it formatted as code.

Eventually I typed some paragraph breaks in my non-code-formatted stuff and copy-pasted that whenever I needed to start a new paragraph that wasn't formatted as code, but that was less than ideal. Is there a simple HTMLish tag I can use for code formatting when typing a question/answer?

item.title: A lock icon appears to the left of some questions - what does it mean?
item.description: The mouse cursor changes into a question mark over the icon but clicking did not reveal a hint.

item.title: Is "plot-explanation" the right tag? What have you learned about the plot of Terminator that you didn't know before from reading this question?
item.description:
Is plot-explanation an apt tag for question below:

Previous discussion
http://ifanswers.com/114/in-terminator-are-the-crew-real-or-a-fantasy

dannii: I'm unable to make a question that links to your comment.

juhanna: Sorry! I'm unable to reply to your comment. I'm unable to make a comment on that post.

item.title: Can I accept more than one answer?
item.description: Alex: I can't vote for your answer but I appreciate it.

item.title: Is this site accessible for vision impaired users?
item.description:
I noticed that there is a flash CAPTCHA to check for robots. It is a gui checkbox. I did not see any alternative controls. I fear that it is not accessible to partially-sighted and blind users. The intfiction forum is partly accessible.

I'm unable to reply to your comment Alex. The reply is: This answer put my fears at rest. I hope users will comment if there are accessibility problems.

item.title: I got an answer in my email but when I go to ifanswers I cant accept it?
item.description: I followed the link in my email but the big tick doesn't appear. What can I do?

item.title: Are new users unable to upvote/downvote responses?
item.description: Using Chrome. The finger appears when mousing over the upvote/downvote buttons, but clicking has no effect.

item.title: I don't get emails / How can I find emails from ifanswers?
item.description: I posted some questions and there are answers but there is nothing in my email.

item.title: I got an answer! There is a big tick next to it - what does it do?
How can I find out in ifanswers if my question is answered?
item.description: I don't have my e-mail open - it would be handy if there was a signal in the interface if there are new answers.

item.title: Is "ratings-recommendations-reviews" too long for a tag?
item.description:
dannii: I'm unable to reply to your comment.

The reply is: I no longer desire to write tags.

item.title: Do questions on a development tool need to mention the version?
item.description: Since questions and answers are arranged topically instead of chronologically on a site like this, should questions about, say, Inform 7 mention/be tagged with the version the asker is using, for the sake of people searching the site in the future?

item.title: What is IF Answers?
item.description: What is this site and why does it exist?
